text: The 1952–53 season was the 73rd season of competitive football by Rangers. ==Overview== Rangers played a total of 46 competitive matches during the 1952–53 season. ==Results== All results are written with Rangers' score first. ===Scottish League Division One=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:100%; text-align:center" !Date!!Opponent!!Venue!!Result!!Attendance!!Scorers |-
